trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
A DataListItem object represents an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data item.

The data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection> that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
You can use a DataListItem to programmatically access the properties of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> class.
The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*> collection.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.

Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> control, which contains the style properties for the control.
This method is primarily used by control developers, when extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties of the control.
Gets or sets a data item associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.

Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object must be set to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType> enumeration values.
An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*> collection of the control.
Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index number of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items*> collection.
Gets the type of the item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
Use the ItemType property to determine the type of the item represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
The following table lists the various item types.

|Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Footer`|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Item`|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`AlternatingItem`|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`SelectedItem`|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`EditItem`|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Separator`|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.| |`Pager`|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.|
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
Determines whether the event for the control is passed up the server control hierarchy.
This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
The source of the event.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object on the client.
Use the RenderItem method to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object on the client.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to extract rows; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display as a table; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType*> property for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> control.
This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the functionality of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> value.

Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the data object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
The IDataItemContainer.DataItem member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the value to use when data-binding operations are performed.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the data-item index for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
The IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An integer representing the index of the data item bound to a control.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the data-item index for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object.
The IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An integer representing the position of the data item as displayed in a control.
